description:
Custom Rich Presence (playing status) manager for Discord. Features run on startup and minimizing to tray.


- You can now choose an activity type! 4 types are available: Playing, Listening, Watching and Competing.
- New translation terms: labelType.
  ToolTip, presenceTypePlaying, presenceTypeListening, presenceTypeWatching, presenceTypeCompeting.
- If the image link is too long, the app will tell you that more reliably, instead of getting stuck in "Updating presence..." loop.
- Added a prompt for deleting user settings when uninstalling the app.
- Fixed a possible crash caused by trying to attach a non-existing file in a crash report.
- Fixed preset files sometimes being "in use by another process" permanently.
- Updated German, Estonian, Filipino, French (new translator, jojoblackFr, and a translator I forgot to mention before, 20syl), Hebrew, Italian, Turkish and Vietnamese.
